Detailed Description

This class minds a whole lot of pointers to classes used to render and control the physical environment in the game.

It deletes any pointers it holds in its destructor.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

EnviroMinder::EnviroMinder ( ChunkSpaceID  spaceID  ) 

Constructor.

EnviroMinder::~EnviroMinder (  ) 

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

void EnviroMinder::activate (  ) 

This method is called when the environment is about to be used.

This occurs when the camera enters a new space, or the engine is about to draw this space through some kind of portal.

void EnviroMinder::addPySkyDome ( PyAttachmentPtr  attachment,
Vector4ProviderPtr  provider 
)

This method adds a PySkyDome, which is a combination of PyAttachment and Vector4Provider.

This method is the converse of delPySkyDome

Parameters:
attachment PyAttachment to use as a sky dome.
provider Vector4Provider that provides control over the skybox.

void EnviroMinder::allowUpdate ( bool  val  )  [inline]

void EnviroMinder::deactivate (  ) 

This method is called when the environment is to be replaced by another active environment.

Decal* EnviroMinder::decal (  )  [inline]

void EnviroMinder::delPySkyDome ( PyAttachmentPtr  attachment,
Vector4ProviderPtr  provider 
)

This method deletes a PySkyDome, which is a combination of PyAttachment and Vector4Provider.

If it can't find the combination, it fails silently. This method is the converse of addPySkyDome

Parameters:
attachment PyAttachment to use as a sky dome.
provider Vector4Provider that provides control over the skybox.

void EnviroMinder::delStaticSkyBoxes (  ) 

This method removes the static sky boxes, i.e.

the ones added via WorldEditor.

void EnviroMinder::drawFore ( float  dTime,
bool  showWeather = true,
bool  showFlora = true,
bool  showFloraShadowing = false,
bool  drawOverLays = true,
bool  drawObjects = true 
)

This method draws the fore parts of the environment stuff.

Parameters:
dTime time elapsed since last call.
showWeather true if fog emmiter should be shown.
showFlora true if flora should be drawn
showFloraShadowing true if flora shadows should be drawn
drawOverLays true if the rain and snow are to be drawn
drawObjects true if scene based (solid) objects are drawn

DrawSelection  drawWhat = DrawSelection(),
bool  showWeather = true 
)

This method draws the selected hind parts of the environment stuff.

dTime time elapsed since last call.

void EnviroMinder::drawHindDelayed ( float  dTime,
DrawSelection  drawWhat = DrawSelection() 
)

This method draws the delayed background of our environment.

We do this here in order to save fillrate, as we can test the delayed background against the opaque scene that

Parameters:
dTime time elapsed since last call.
drawWhat bitset specifying what bits of the sky to draw.

void EnviroMinder::drawSkyDomes ( bool  isOcclusionPass = false  ) 

This method draws the EnviroMinder's sky boxes.

void EnviroMinder::drawSkySunCloudsMoon ( float  dTime,
DrawSelection  drawWhat 
)

This method draws the sky, sun, clouds and moon.

It may be called either before the scene is rendered (non-shader cards), or after the scene is rendered (shader cards).

Parameters:
dTime time elapsed since last call.
drawWhat bitset specifying what bits of the sky to draw.

EnvironmentCubeMap* EnviroMinder::environmentCubeMap (  )  [inline]

float EnviroMinder::farPlane (  )  const

Returns the current far plane in use (generally farPlaneBaseLine * graphics settings multiplier).

Returns:
current far plane value.

float EnviroMinder::farPlaneBaseLine (  )  const

Returns the far plane base line.

This is normally read from the space.settings file. It will be adjusted by the graphics settings multiplier before being used as the far plane.

Returns:
far plane base line value.

bool EnviroMinder::load ( DataSectionPtr  pDS,
bool  loadFromExternal = true 
)

Load method.

Any errors are handled internally, even if loading fails. This method must be called before the environment classes can be used.

Parameters:
pDS the space.settings data section for this space
loadFromExternal true if cofing data should be loaded from external source
Returns:
always returns true.

bool EnviroMinder::playerDead (  )  const [inline]

bool EnviroMinder::primitiveVideoCard (  )  [static]

This method returns true if the video card supports a shader version.

If no shaders are supported, we may draw the environment slightly differently, in particular the sky + clouds are drawn before the scene instead of afterwards.
